Heading: Raised by
Value: Mother and Father until age 5, mother and stepfather after age 5

Heading: Family event
Value: Rex’s aunt (father’s sister) was murdered. Family attributes this event as “beginning of the downward spiral”

Heading: Sexually abused?
Value: Unknown (oldest sister was abused by step-father)

Heading: Applied for job as a cop?
Been to a psychologist?
Value: Yes, only allowed to go once

Heading: Diagnosis
Value: “primary difficulties with adolescent, anti-social behavior and difficulties residing within the family situation”

Heading: Committed previous crimes?
Value: Yes; rape, attempted rape, sodomy, burglary, breaking and entering, grand theft auto, assault

Heading: Killer age at start of series
How close did killer live?
Value: Several miles out of the town

Heading: Killing occurred in home of victim?
Killing occurred in home of killer?
Left at scene, no attempt to hide
Left at scene, buried
Value: Yes (buried Rachel outside an abandoned house, where killing occurred)

Heading: Moved, buried
Value: Yes (killed Aundria at his house, buried body on a hill behind the house)

Heading: Moved, too home
Value: Yes, already at or near home
